attributes.action: Protect rape victims against grooming gangs and call inquiry on recent once
attributes.additional_details: For the government to crack down on grooming gangs the recent government labour said they will 'deliver change' this is the 'change' we need. A report in Rotherham estimated there were at least 1,400 victims and the report in Telford estimated 1,000 victims at a minimum. all evidence can be found with link here: https://www.standard.co.uk/comment/grooming-gangs-national-abuse-inquiry-elon-musk-victims-b1203415.html
attributes.background: Recently there has been a grooming gang that's been unmasked and the currently government have declined and said there NO need for a national inquiry, when there needs to be and put safe guarding in place to support the victims via mental health support and other support they may require

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
